title: SEC charges HyperVerse founders with crypto fraud after $2 billion Ponzi scheme
description: HyperVerse founders Sam Lee and Brenda Chunga standcharged criminallywith conspiracy to commit wire fraud.

title: ChatGPT Accused of Leaking Private Conversations and Passwords, Ars Reader Raises Alarm
description: In a startling revelation, an Ars reader has brought forth evidence suggesting that ChatGPT, the popular AI-powered chatbot developed by OpenAI, may be leaking sensitive information from private conversations of its users. The screenshots submitted by the reader on Monday paint a concerning picture, indicating the unauthorized disclosure of login credentials, personal details, and other […]
